HERO.TITLE: Simplify your vehicle maintenance with Autonexo
HERO.SUBTITLE: We are the app that connects drivers with certified mechanics in minutes.
HERO.DESCRIPTION: Autonexo digitizes automotive maintenance: request services, receive quotes and manage your vehicle's history quickly, transparently and reliably.

FEATURES.TITLE: Features
FEATURES.SUBTITLE: Everything, all that you want  you need for a complete automotive service

CARD1.TITLE: Instant Booking
CARD1.DESCRIPTION: Book your maintenance or repair service in seconds. Our system automatically connects with available mechanics in your area.

CARD2.TITLE: Certified Mechanics
CARD2.DESCRIPTION: All our mechanics are certified and verified. We work only with trusted professionals to ensure service quality.

CARD3.TITLE: Real-time Tracking
CARD3.DESCRIPTION: Monitor your service progress in real-time. Receive notifications and constant updates about your vehicle's status.

CARD4.TITLE: Transparent Pricing
CARD4.DESCRIPTION: No hidden costs or surprises. Know the exact price before confirming your booking and pay securely through the platform.

PLANS.TITLE: Choose your plan
PLANS.SUBTITLE: Start building beautiful components today. Upgrade anytime as your needs grow.

PRO.TITLE: Pro
PRO.DESCRIPTION: First steps to join Autonexo's team and improve your business.

PREMIUM.TITLE: Premium
PREMIUM.DESCRIPTION: Perfect for serious businesses looking to expand their services and technical capabilities.

PLANS.CUSTOM: Need a custom solution? We're here to help.

0.QUESTION: What is Autonexo exactly?
0.ANSWER: Autonexo is a platform that connects vehicle owners with certified mechanics quickly and reliably. Book maintenance or repair services in minutes.

1.QUESTION: Do I need technical knowledge to use it?
1.ANSWER: No, Autonexo is designed to be easy to use. You just need to describe your problem and our system will connect you with the right mechanic.

2.QUESTION: Can I use these services commercially?
2.ANSWER: Yes! All Autonexo services can be used for commercial vehicles. There are no licensing restrictions for using our services.

3.QUESTION: Are the services reliable and secure?
3.ANSWER: Absolutely. Autonexo verifies all mechanics, includes liability insurance and follows security best practices.

4.QUESTION: How do I integrate Autonexo into my workflow?
4.ANSWER: Simply download the app, create your profile and start booking services. Autonexo integrates perfectly with your daily routine.
